Chinụa Ezenwa-Ọhaeto bụ onye Naijiria na-ede uri na agụmakwụkwọ.
A mụrụ Chinua Ezenwa-Ohaeto na 1992 na Awka, Anambra State, ebe nna ya Ezenwa- Ohaeto kụziri na Mahadum Nnamdi Azikiwe
Ọ tolitere n'etiti Germany na Naịjirịa n'ihi ọrụ nna ya
A gụrụ ya aha Chinua Achebe, onye bụ onye nkuzi nna ya
Ka ọ na-etolite, Ezenwa-Ohaeto chere na ọ ga-abụ onye na-emepụta ihe mana ọ gbanwere obi ya mgbe ọ malitere ịgụ uri nna ya
O nwetara nzere bachelọ na masta ya na asụsụ Bekee na akwụkwọ edemede na Mahadum Naịjirịa, Nsukka. Ọ bụ nwa akwụkwọ PhD ugbu a maka.Edemede ihe okike na mahadum Nebraska -lincoln.
Na 2009 chinua nwetara ihe nrite uri ana/mazariy ya teen dika onye ohuru na Mahadum Nigeria,Nsukka
Ọ bụ onye nke abụọ na 2014 maka Etisalat Prize for Literature, ụdị akụkọ ifo. N'afọ 2017, o bipụtara akwụkwọ chapbook, The Teenager Who Became My Mother, site na Sevhage Publishers

N'afọ 2018, ọ meriri ihe nrite Castello di Duino Poesia maka uri a na-ebipụtaghị ma bụrụ onye nataraNew Hampshire institute of arts 2018 Ihe nrite ide, yana onye natara akwụkwọ mmụta na ụlọ akwụkwọ MFA
2019, Ọ bụ onye meriri ihe nrite uri sevhage/Angus na onye gbara ọsọ nke abụọ na asọmpi uri Singapore nke ise
